SummaryEnglish: Although the idol group TiNgS is chasing after big dreams, so far their accomplishments have only been small — and now, suddenly, they're facing a potential break up! Hope seems lost, but when a new manager with a special skillset takes them under his wing, the members of TiNgS find themselves shooting for the stars all over again.

1.TitleEnglish: まだまだ間に合う！シャインポスト振り返りSP
1.SummaryEnglish:
2022/08/25(木) 21:00～21:30
ＡＴ－Ｘ
シャインポスト 特番

この時間は『まだまだ間に合う！シャインポスト振り返りSP』を放送いたします

詳細情報
＜ストーリー＞
大きな夢を抱くも、小さな成果しかあげられないアイドルユニット『TiNgS』の玉城杏夏、青天国春、聖舞理王。彼女らに救いの手として用意されたのは、曰く最強マネージャー、のはずが……現われたのは、まるでやる気のない男、日生直輝だった。だが、彼には一つ特別な力が備わっていて……？これは、絶対アイドルを目指すため、君と少女たちが光り輝く物語。
＜キャスト＞
青天国 春：鈴代紗弓/玉城杏夏：蟹沢萌子/聖舞理王：夏吉ゆうこ/祗園寺雪音：長谷川里桃/伊藤紅葉：中川梨花/螢：大橋彩香/黒金 蓮：芹澤 優/唐林青葉：高瀬くるみ/唐林絃葉：久保田未夢/氷海菜花：高柳知葉/苗川 柔：香里有佐/兎塚七海：野口衣織/広瀬実唯菜：齋藤樹愛羅/日生優希：小松未可子/虎渡 誉：富田美憂

2.TitleEnglish: シャインポスト特別版 TINGS 5人が裏の裏まで見せちゃいますSP 1st
2.SummaryEnglish:
2022/09/26(月) 09:00～09:30
ＡＴ－Ｘ
シャインポスト 特別版1

この時間は「シャインポスト特別版　TINGS 5人が裏の裏まで見せちゃいますSP 1st」を放送いたします

詳細情報
＜番組内容＞
1話～9話の内容を振り返りながらTINGSの5人の声優メンバーが出演し魅力を紹介。アニメを彩る名曲と共にお楽しみください。また、主題歌「ワンダー・スターター」のミュージックビデオ制作に密着。TINGSの5人がレッスンや撮影に励む舞台裏をたっぷりお届けします。
＜出演＞
TINGS（鈴代紗弓、蟹沢萌子、夏吉ゆうこ、長谷川里桃、中川梨花）
MC：市來玲奈

3.TitleEnglish: シャインポスト特別版 TINGS 5人が裏の裏まで見せちゃいますSP 2nd
3.SummaryEnglish:
2022/10/05(水) 15:00～15:30
ＡＴ－Ｘ
シャインポスト 特別版2

この時間は「シャインポスト特別版　TINGS 5人が裏の裏まで見せちゃいますSP 2nd」を放送いたします

詳細情報
＜番組内容＞
マネージャー日生直輝の名言からTINGSの軌跡を振り返ります。さらに、TINGS5人による楽曲のカラオケ歌唱やマル秘情報の公開も！
＜出演＞
TINGS（鈴代紗弓、蟹沢萌子、夏吉ゆうこ、長谷川里桃、中川梨花）
MC：市來玲奈

1.SummaryEnglish: They say if you shoot for the moon, you’ll land among the stars. But with a lofty new goal before them, the members of TiNgS fear they may come crashing down to earth…

2.SummaryEnglish: A year has passed, and TiNgS is still slinging tickets on the street. They’ll need to work hard to sell out their venue, but their usual methods may not be up to the task…

3.SummaryEnglish: Just a bad dream, or an omen of things to come? Kyoka isn’t sure, but nightmares become reality when her new manager introduces a shocking shakeup to TiNgS’ lineup.

4.TitleEnglish: Kyoka Tamaki Does Not Stand Out
4.SummaryEnglish: Kyoka knows she can’t be an idol when she’s no one special; failure after failure proved that! But sometimes, a person is their own worst enemy.

5.SummaryEnglish: When opportunities come knocking, TiNgS will answer the door! But Rio’s big opportunity may leave a bitter aftertaste…

6.TitleEnglish: Rio Seibu Wants to Be Praised
6.SummaryEnglish: Rio absolutely REFUSES to be the center during the premiere of a new TiNgS song, and no one knows why. Something is holding her back, but she’s not eager to share feelings.

7.TitleEnglish: Momiji Ito Will Not Go Back
7.SummaryEnglish: The capitalization of TiNgS’ name tells a story of division. Their manager wants to write a new chapter of that story — and this time, their name will tell a tale of unity.

8.TitleEnglish: Yukine Gionji Will Not Allow It
8.SummaryEnglish: Can a star shine so brightly it drowns out the light of other stars? Do other stars notice they aren’t the brightest in the sky? Yukine knows the answer intimately.

9.SummaryEnglish: If they want Haru to shine to her full potential, TINGS will need to bring their A-game when performing one of the first songs their full unit ever learned.

10.TitleEnglish: Ren Kurogane Wants to Go Back
10.SummaryEnglish: TINGS has their hands full with one seemingly insurmountable hurdle, but another, even higher obstacle is waiting in the wings to rain on their parade…

11.SummaryEnglish: Ren is determined to bring Haru back, but why is she so intent on dragging Haru away from TINGS? It seems a promise from the past brings pain to the present.

12.SummaryEnglish: The moment of truth is upon them, and now TINGS must shine in the way only they can. Anxious, inexperienced, utterly joyful — it’s time to show the real TINGS to the world.
